set(GODOT_MODULE_TEXT_SERVER_ADV_DIR ${GODOT_MODULES_BASE_DIR}/text_server_adv)
godot_add_library(icu4c FOLDER thirdparty STATIC)
# [[[cog
#   import cog
#   from cmake_builders import list_files
#   cog.outl('target_sources(icu4c PRIVATE')
#   for file in list_files(cog, ['common', 'common/unicode', 'i18n']):
#       cog.outl(f'        {file}')
#   cog.outl(')')
# ]]]

        common/wintz.h
        i18n/scriptset.cpp
        i18n/scriptset.h
        i18n/ucln_in.cpp
        i18n/ucln_in.h
        i18n/uspoof.cpp
        i18n/uspoof_impl.cpp
        i18n/uspoof_impl.h
)
# [[[end]]]
target_sources(icu4c PRIVATE ${GODOT_MODULE_TEXT_SERVER_ADV_DIR}/icu_data/icudata_stub.cpp)
target_include_directories(icu4c PUBLIC common i18n)

target_compile_definitions(icu4c PRIVATE
        -DU_STATIC_IMPLEMENTATION
        -DU_COMMON_IMPLEMENTATION
        -DUCONFIG_NO_COLLATION
        -DUCONFIG_NO_CONVERSION
        -DUCONFIG_NO_FORMATTING
        -DUCONFIG_NO_SERVICE
        -DUCONFIG_NO_IDNA
        -DUCONFIG_NO_FILE_IO
        -DUCONFIG_NO_TRANSLITERATION
        -DPKGDATA_MODE=static
        -DU_ENABLE_DYLOAD=0
        -DU_HAVE_LIB_SUFFIX=1
        -DU_LIB_SUFFIX_C_NAME=_godot
        -DICU_DATA_NAME=icudt72l.dat
)
target_compile_definitions(icu4c PUBLIC
        -DU_HAVE_LIB_SUFFIX=1
        -DU_LIB_SUFFIX_C_NAME=_godot
        -DICU_DATA_NAME=icudt72l.dat
)
target_compile_options(icu4c PRIVATE $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,/w,-w>)
